admission process: The admission process at BMSIT includes entrance exams like KCET or COMEDK.
courses offered: BMSIT offers courses in Engineering, AI & ML, Data Science, and more.
contact details: You can contact us at 080-28561576 or email us at info@bmsit.in.
campus facilities: The campus has state-of-the-art labs, hostels, sports facilities, and libraries.
placement statistics: BMSIT has a placement record of 95% with top recruiters like Infosys and Wipro.
hostel facilities: Hostels have Wi-Fi, study halls, and mess facilities.
